desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.en: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.
desc.jp: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.
desc.zh_cn: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。阳奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。阳奈表示将处以亚子紧闭处分。

desc.en: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.
desc.jp: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了歌赫娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Hina announces that the Prefect Team will be leaving tight now, and askes the Foreclosure Task Force to forgive them, stating that they will not invade anymore. The troops leave quickly.
desc.jp: Hina announces that the Prefect Team will be leaving tight now, and askes the Foreclosure Task Force to forgive them, stating that they will not invade anymore. The troops leave quickly.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈宣布风纪委员会全部撤离，并向对策委员会请求原谅，表示今后不再会擅自入侵。歌赫娜的队伍迅速离去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳奈宣布风纪委员会全部撤离，并向对策委员会请求原谅，表示今后不再会擅自入侵。格黑娜的队伍迅速离去。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Being late on site, Hoshino is confused about what happened. Everyone decides to discuss it tomorrow in classroom and returns early. Shiroko notices that Hina seems to have said something to Sensei, and Sensei says that they will know it by tomorrow.
desc.jp: Being late on site, Hoshino is confused about what happened. Everyone decides to discuss it tomorrow in classroom and returns early. Shiroko notices that Hina seems to have said something to Sensei, and Sensei says that they will know it by tomorrow.
desc.zh_cn: 迟到的星野对事情懵懵懂懂，不知究竟发生了什么事。大家决定明天在教室再讨论，所有人都提早回去了。白子注意到，阳奈在走之前似乎跟老师说了些什么。老师表示之后会跟大家说的。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.jp: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.zh_cn: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

desc.en: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.jp: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.zh_cn: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.
desc.jp: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。芹香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。茜香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。

desc.en: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.
desc.jp: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.
desc.zh_cn: 绫音通过已有的线索，最终认定凯撒集团盯上的正是阿拜多斯的土地，但对具体原因仍并不特别清楚。老师向各位讲出了从阳奈那听来的事情，众人立刻决定前往沙漠。

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.jp: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.zh_cn: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，对策委员会小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: [USERNAME] Sensei goes to the Gehenna Academy and Trinity General School to enlist their help. Meanwhile, Problem Solver 68 are treated to ramen at Master Shiba Seki's newly opened stall and make up their minds to help the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn_jp: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往歌赫娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往格黑娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: [USERNAME]老师为了求助而前往格黑娜学园和三一学园。另一方面，受到开路边摊的柴关老板招待拉面的便利屋一行人，决定帮助对策委员会。

desc.en: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: At [USERNAME] Sensei's behest, Hina and the Prefect Team come to the Foreclosure Task Force's defense against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的阳奈和歌赫娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的阳奈和格黑娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 接受[USERNAME]老师请求的阳奈和格黑娜风纪委员会一行人，助阿拜多斯对策委员会一臂之力与PMC士兵交战。

desc.en: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.
desc.jp: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师来到歌赫娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Hifumi reports Sensei's request to the Tea Party. Nagisa, the president of the Tea Party, designates Hifumi to aid them with the students learning towed howitzers, after considering the potential interference to the signing of the treaty that PMC might cause.
desc.jp: Hifumi reports Sensei's request to the Tea Party. Nagisa, the president of the Tea Party, designates Hifumi to aid them with the students learning towed howitzers, after considering the potential interference to the signing of the treaty that PMC might cause.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日富美向茶会报告了老师的请求，茶会的渚在思考后决定为了削减PMC可能的潜在对条约签署的影响，委派日富美带牵引式榴弹炮的学生前去支援。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 日步美向茶会报告了老师的请求，茶会的渚在思考后决定为了削减PMC可能的潜在对条约签署的影响，委派日步美带牵引式榴弹炮的学生前去支援。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日富美向茶会报告了老师的请求，茶会的渚在思考后决定为了削减PMC可能的潜在对条约签署的影响，委派日富美带牵引式榴弹炮的学生前去支援。

hobby.zh_cn_tw: 收集茶叶、制作点心、整理庭园

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 收集佩洛洛周边玩具、购物、做倾听者

desc.en: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.jp: The 82th track in Blue Archive, used exclusively in the recollection lobby of Hifumi's.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第82首曲子，特别用于日步美(日富美)的会议大厅中。

desc.en: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.jp: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，阿露表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳世子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，亚瑠表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将在路边开了个小摊子，遇到便利屋68四人。同上次一样，老板给四个人盛了一大碗面，只不过这次一人一碗。吃完后，佳代子对是否要参与战斗还有些疑虑，不过因为委托费给够，爱露表示不得不去——不过仍然是强装的罢了。

desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

name.en: The Prefect Team Goes To War!
name.jp: The Prefect Team Goes To War!

desc.en: As a reward of the participation, Hina made an exception and changed the punishment of writing self-criticism patters to this operation. Hina demands that no enemies should even have a slightest scratch on Sensei.
desc.jp: As a reward of the participation, Hina made an exception and changed the punishment of writing self-criticism patters to this operation. Hina demands that no enemies should even have a slightest scratch on Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 风纪委员会四人全员参战。作为此次参战的奖励，阳奈破例将原先写检讨的处分改为了此次作战。阳奈要求不能让敌人碰到老师的一分一毫。

desc.en: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.jp: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。

desc.en: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.jp: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.jp: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千禧年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。

desc.en: After Yuuka left, the twins talked about their plans, and they mentioned the book named G.Bible in particular. Momoi also said that she won't allow Yuuka to view them and their games, some losers and junks.
desc.jp: After Yuuka left, the twins talked about their plans, and they mentioned the book named G.Bible in particular. Momoi also said that she won't allow Yuuka to view them and their games, some losers and junks.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 离开后，游戏部二人向老师讲述了他们的计划，并提到了《G.Bible》一书。桃井还提到，她不想让优香认为这些游戏就是废品、他们是失败者。

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.jp: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理社>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理会>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真理会的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃的游戏存档不可恢复，桃听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理社也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千禧年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理会也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Yuuka got the intel of Game Development Department planning to raid Seminar with Veritas, and so she asked assistance from Akane of C&C.

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.jp: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长尼禄。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过尼禄，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长宁瑠。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过宁瑠，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长妮露。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过妮露，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。

desc.en: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.jp: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现尼禄回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了尼禄使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现宁瑠回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了宁瑠使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现妮露回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了妮露使其离开。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了尼禄。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C强大的夹攻成功让季处于劣势。季变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了宁瑠。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉音的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了妮露。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。

desc.en: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在C&C和季对峙的时候，莉音早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。

desc.en: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.jp: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将尼禄与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C与季打的有来有回。季领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将宁瑠与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将妮露与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。

desc.en: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.jp: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 与真理社的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 与贝里塔斯的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉音的问候。莉音对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉音见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 与真理会的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Though ugly, the firepower of the Avant Guard was not meant to be underestimated. The GDD and the ED lost the battle against Avant Guard at last.
desc.jp: Though ugly, the firepower of the Avant Guard was not meant to be underestimated. The GDD and the ED lost the battle against Avant Guard at last.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然长相丑陋，但前卫君的实力不可小觑。游戏开发部与工程部一行人最终不敌前卫君，作战失败。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Since Neru was not there, it was then did everyone realize that it was the best time for the President to suppress Sensei. The President said it was all their doings and commanded Avant Guard to end all of this.
desc.jp: Since Neru was not there, it was then did everyone realize that it was the best time for the President to suppress Sensei. The President said it was all their doings and commanded Avant Guard to end all of this.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为尼禄不在身边，众人这才发现这正是会长压制老师的最好时机。会长表示这正好是他们自己所造成，并命令前卫君终结这一切。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为妮露不在身边，众人这才发现这正是会长压制老师的最好时机。会长表示这正好是他们自己所造成，并命令前卫君终结这一切。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和优香出现了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部抵达莉音所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉音准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和优香出现了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和优香出现了。

desc.en: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.jp: Neru was at her limits after suppressing Toki, and the GDD promised to her that they were sure to bring Aris back.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄成功压制时。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠成功压制季。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露成功压制时。因为身体透支，要求游戏开发部一定要将爱丽丝带回来。游戏开发部三人做了保证。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris could bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.jp: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris could bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与日鞠的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉音仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉音的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与阳葵的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与日鞠的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。

desc.en: What everyone embraced was not Aris, but rather another being, which was called Key. Aris' personality was isolated in the deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and requested Sensei to leave before Key ever finished it, trying to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.
desc.jp: What everyone embraced was not Aris, but rather another being, which was called Key. Aris' personality was isolated in the deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and requested Sensei to leave before Key ever finished it, trying to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人迎来的不是爱丽丝，而是一个名叫“Key”的个体。爱丽丝的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了埃里都，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉央为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，优香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人迎来的不是爱丽丝，而是一个名叫“Key”的个体。爱丽丝的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了埃里都，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉音为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，优香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人迎来的不是爱丽丝，而是一个名叫“Key”的个体。爱丽丝的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了埃里都，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉央为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，优香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部和老师终于遇见爱丽丝了。爱丽丝说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是爱丽丝终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。

desc.en: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.jp: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和游戏开发部一行人来到了爱丽丝的意识深处，在那他们见到了爱丽丝与Key。开发部想要带爱丽丝回去，但Key突然出现，并重新提醒“公主”她所见到的一切。

desc.en: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.jp: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的尼禄、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、尼禄负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与季对峙的宁瑠、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、宁瑠负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的妮露、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、妮露负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.jp: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及尼禄前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝想起了莉音。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉音时的情形，以及宁瑠前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及妮露前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。

desc.en: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
desc.jp: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第140首曲子，以主线故事中与爱丽丝的相关部分而熟知。

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.jp: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.jp: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千禧年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"
desc.jp: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"
desc.zh_cn: 大家都想听听爱丽丝的真心话。爱丽丝因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。爱丽丝犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与游戏开发部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，游戏开发部啊！”

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.jp: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于爱丽丝意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，埃里都控制中心也恢复正常。莉央惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是游戏开发部所能做到的。最终，游戏开发部三人与爱丽丝团聚。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于爱丽丝意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，埃里都控制中心也恢复正常。莉音惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是游戏开发部所能做到的。最终，游戏开发部三人与爱丽丝团聚。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于爱丽丝意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，埃里都控制中心也恢复正常。莉央惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是游戏开发部所能做到的。最终，游戏开发部三人与爱丽丝团聚。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.en: 老師、茶會和一些三一學生共同參加了對彌香的聽證會，聽證會最後決定剝奪彌香作為茶會成員所有的權力等。彌香雖被釋放，但被警告不要參加學業以外的活動。聽證會以彌香沒有異議結束。
desc.jp: 老師、茶會和一些三一學生共同參加了對彌香的聽證會，聽證會最後決定剝奪彌香作為茶會成員所有的權力等。彌香雖被釋放，但被警告不要參加學業以外的活動。聽證會以彌香沒有異議結束。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师、茶会和一些崔尼蒂学生共同参加了对未花的听证会，听证会最后决定剥夺未花作为茶会成员所有的权力等。未花虽被释放，但被警告不要参加学业以外的活动。听证会以未花没有异议结束。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师、茶会和一些三一学生共同参加了对弥香的听证会，听证会最后决定剥夺弥香作为茶会成员所有的权力等。弥香虽被释放，但被警告不要参加学业以外的活动。听证会以弥香没有异议结束。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师、茶会和一些三一学生共同参加了对未花的听证会，听证会最后决定剥夺未花作为茶会成员所有的权力等。未花虽被释放，但被警告不要参加学业以外的活动。听证会以未花没有异议结束。

desc.en: 梓和日步美大失所望：玩偶並不是所謂的佩洛洛吉拉，而是佩洛洛恐龍，兩種完全不同的東西。眾人大失所望。老闆則後悔在黑市花了大價錢買下它。
desc.jp: 梓和日步美大失所望：玩偶並不是所謂的佩洛洛吉拉，而是佩洛洛恐龍，兩種完全不同的東西。眾人大失所望。老闆則後悔在黑市花了大價錢買下它。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梓和日富美大失所望：玩偶并不是所谓的佩洛洛吉拉，而是佩洛洛恐龙，两种完全不同的东西。众人大失所望。老板则后悔在黑市花了大价钱买下它。

desc.en: 花子解釋，這次判決後，三一的形勢一下發生了變化。茶會顏面掃地不被信任、教父派的一些人企圖用空出的位子製造混亂――還有一些人純粹就是跟風。小春對彌香基本沒有惡意。梓表示，彌香幫助了奧利斯小隊，她更不可能對她有惡意。
desc.jp: 花子解釋，這次判決後，三一的形勢一下發生了變化。茶會顏面掃地不被信任、教父派的一些人企圖用空出的位子製造混亂――還有一些人純粹就是跟風。小春對彌香基本沒有惡意。梓表示，彌香幫助了奧利斯小隊，她更不可能對她有惡意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 花子解释，这次判决后，崔尼蒂的形势一下发生了变化。茶会颜面扫地不被信任、教父派的一些人企图用空出的位子制造混乱――还有一些人纯粹就是跟风。小春对未花基本没有恶意。梓表示，未花帮助了阿里乌斯小队，她更不可能对她有恶意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 花子解释，这次判决后，三一的形势一下发生了变化。茶会颜面扫地不被信任、教父派的一些人企图用空出的位子制造混乱――还有一些人纯粹就是跟风。小春对弥香基本没有恶意。梓表示，弥香帮助了奥利斯小队，她更不可能对她有恶意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 花子解释，这次判决后，三一的形势一下发生了变化。茶会颜面扫地不被信任、教父派的一些人企图用空出的位子制造混乱――还有一些人纯粹就是跟风。小春对未花基本没有恶意。梓表示，未花帮助了阿里乌斯小队，她更不可能对她有恶意。

desc.en: 放學後的甜點部正好經過這裡，遇到了不滿判決結果的學生們。本來放學後的甜點部是為了來吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，結果並沒有看到。眾人詢問不滿的學生們，後者不但沒回答還試圖將他們捲入其中。
desc.jp: 放學後的甜點部正好經過這裡，遇到了不滿判決結果的學生們。本來放學後的甜點部是為了來吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，結果並沒有看到。眾人詢問不滿的學生們，後者不但沒回答還試圖將他們捲入其中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 甜点部正好经过这里，遇到了不满判决结果的学生们。本来甜点部是为了来吃冰激凌巧克力蛋糕的，结果并没有看到。众人询问不满的学生们，后者不但没回答还试图将他们卷入其中。

「普通に」スイーツを食べること

desc.en: 眾人討論了一會彌香的事，之後回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威學生詢問是否看到冰激凌車，而後者表示因為會妨礙他們，所以把它趕走了。愛莉追問冰激凌車的下落，沒想到遭到示威學生的不悅，將其推開。
desc.jp: 眾人討論了一會彌香的事，之後回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威學生詢問是否看到冰激凌車，而後者表示因為會妨礙他們，所以把它趕走了。愛莉追問冰激凌車的下落，沒想到遭到示威學生的不悅，將其推開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人讨论了一会未花的事，之后回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威学生询问是否看到冰激凌车，而后者表示因为会妨碍他们，所以把它赶走了。爱莉追问冰激凌车的下落，没想到遭到示威学生的不悦，将其推开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人讨论了一会弥香的事，之后回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威学生询问是否看到冰激凌车，而后者表示因为会妨碍他们，所以把它赶走了。爱莉追问冰激凌车的下落，没想到遭到示威学生的不悦，将其推开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人讨论了一会未花的事，之后回到原本的冰激凌上。夏向示威学生询问是否看到冰激凌车，而后者表示因为会妨碍他们，所以把它赶走了。爱理追问冰激凌车的下落，没想到遭到示威学生的不悦，将其推开。

desc.en: 因為他們對愛莉動了粗，放學後的甜點部眾人與其他人起了衝突。イチカ見狀，不得不申請支援――放學後的甜點部看到後為避免麻煩，立刻逃跑。
desc.jp: 因為他們對愛莉動了粗，放學後的甜點部眾人與其他人起了衝突。イチカ見狀，不得不申請支援――放學後的甜點部看到後為避免麻煩，立刻逃跑。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为他们对爱莉动了粗，甜点部众人与其他人起了冲突。一花见状，不得不申请支援――甜点部看到后为避免麻烦，立刻逃跑。

desc.en: 奇普託斯的天空再次出現了超高濃度的能量體，不久後虛假的聖所再次出現，整個氣氛瀰漫著危機。對策委員會的所有人目標都一致，大家都認為要把白子帶回來。發現色彩的嚮導者誘騙者的所在地了。
desc.jp: 奇普託斯的天空再次出現了超高濃度的能量體，不久後虛假的聖所再次出現，整個氣氛瀰漫著危機。對策委員會的所有人目標都一致，大家都認為要把白子帶回來。發現色彩的嚮導者誘騙者的所在地了。
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯的天空再次出现了超高浓度的能量体，不久后虚假的圣所再次出现，整个气氛弥漫着危机。对策委员会的所有人目标都一致，大家都认为要把白子带回来。发现色彩的向导者诱骗者的所在地了。

name.en: 黑色西裝人與瑪艾斯托洛
name.jp: 黑色西裝人與瑪艾斯托洛
name.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人与玛艾斯托洛
name.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西装人与玛艾斯托洛
name.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人与玛艾斯托洛

desc.en: 在色彩襲擊後，黑色西裝人和瑪艾斯托洛受傷嚴重，後者甚至是黑服臨時拼接的。黑服指出色彩似乎看透了一切，奪走了他們所擁有的一切力量。
desc.jp: 在色彩襲擊後，黑色西裝人和瑪艾斯托洛受傷嚴重，後者甚至是黑服臨時拼接的。黑服指出色彩似乎看透了一切，奪走了他們所擁有的一切力量。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在色彩袭击后，黑色西服人和玛艾斯托洛受伤严重，后者甚至是黑服临时拼接的。黑服指出色彩似乎看透了一切，夺走了他们所拥有的一切力量。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在色彩袭击后，黑色西装人和玛艾斯托洛受伤严重，后者甚至是黑服临时拼接的。黑服指出色彩似乎看透了一切，夺走了他们所拥有的一切力量。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在色彩袭击后，黑色西服人和玛艾斯托洛受伤严重，后者甚至是黑服临时拼接的。黑服指出色彩似乎看透了一切，夺走了他们所拥有的一切力量。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.jp: Maestro is an adult of Gematria.
desc.zh_cn: 玛艾斯托洛是从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人。

desc.en: 由於色彩的活動，黑色西裝人表示基沃託斯已經不適合他們繼續活動。瑪艾斯托洛詢問這是否意味著基沃託斯的終結，而黑服則提到了老師。黑服突然宣佈蓋瑪特利亞原地解散。之後兩人交流了一下其他各成員的情況。
desc.jp: 由於色彩的活動，黑色西裝人表示基沃託斯已經不適合他們繼續活動。瑪艾斯托洛詢問這是否意味著基沃託斯的終結，而黑服則提到了老師。黑服突然宣佈蓋瑪特利亞原地解散。之後兩人交流了一下其他各成員的情況。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于色彩的活动，黑色西服人表示基沃托斯已经不适合他们继续活动。玛艾斯托洛询问这是否意味着基沃托斯的终结，而黑服则提到了老师。黑服突然宣布盖玛特利亚原地解散。之后两人交流了一下其他各成员的情况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于色彩的活动，黑色西装人表示基沃托斯已经不适合他们继续活动。玛艾斯托洛询问这是否意味着基沃托斯的终结，而黑服则提到了老师。黑服突然宣布盖玛特利亚原地解散。之后两人交流了一下其他各成员的情况。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于色彩的活动，黑色西服人表示基沃托斯已经不适合他们继续活动。玛艾斯托洛询问这是否意味着基沃托斯的终结，而黑服则提到了老师。黑服突然宣布盖玛特利亚原地解散。之后两人交流了一下其他各成员的情况。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: 聖亞向對策委員會眾人表示，白子應該是接觸了色彩才變得那樣。眾人無法理解這番話的含義。聖亞指出，白子或許是認為自己的世界再無方法改變，於是順從了所謂命運的指引。
desc.jp: 聖亞向對策委員會眾人表示，白子應該是接觸了色彩才變得那樣。眾人無法理解這番話的含義。聖亞指出，白子或許是認為自己的世界再無方法改變，於是順從了所謂命運的指引。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 圣娅向对策委员会众人表示，白子应该是接触了色彩才变得那样。众人无法理解这番话的含义。圣娅指出，白子或许是认为自己的世界再无方法改变，于是顺从了所谓命运的指引。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 圣亚向对策委员会众人表示，白子应该是接触了色彩才变得那样。众人无法理解这番话的含义。圣亚指出，白子或许是认为自己的世界再无方法改变，于是顺从了所谓命运的指引。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 圣娅向对策委员会众人表示，白子应该是接触了色彩才变得那样。众人无法理解这番话的含义。圣娅指出，白子或许是认为自己的世界再无方法改变，于是顺从了所谓命运的指引。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 眾人理解了聖亞的話，指出這似乎表明全是那“色彩”搞的鬼。聖亞表示目前沒有辦法能將白子變回來，但老師已經向百鬼夜行請求幫助，自己也在和修女會一同研究。
desc.jp: 眾人理解了聖亞的話，指出這似乎表明全是那“色彩”搞的鬼。聖亞表示目前沒有辦法能將白子變回來，但老師已經向百鬼夜行請求幫助，自己也在和修女會一同研究。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人理解了圣娅的话，指出这似乎表明全是那“色彩”搞的鬼。圣娅表示目前没有办法能将白子变回来，但老师已经向百鬼夜行请求帮助，自己也在和姐妹会一同研究。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人理解了圣亚的话，指出这似乎表明全是那“色彩”搞的鬼。圣亚表示目前没有办法能将白子变回来，但老师已经向百鬼夜行请求帮助，自己也在和修女会一同研究。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人理解了圣娅的话，指出这似乎表明全是那“色彩”搞的鬼。圣娅表示目前没有办法能将白子变回来，但老师已经向百鬼夜行请求帮助，自己也在和修女会一同研究。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.

desc.en: 忍術研究部一行人打開了信件，信中指出，被色彩侵蝕之人沒有復原的方法，如同逝者不可再生，是世界的絕對法則。
desc.jp: 忍術研究部一行人打開了信件，信中指出，被色彩侵蝕之人沒有復原的方法，如同逝者不可再生，是世界的絕對法則。
desc.zh_cn: 忍术研究部一行人打开了信件，信中指出，被色彩侵蚀之人没有复原的方法，如同逝者不可再生，是世界的绝对法则。

desc.en: 琳指出這次情況較上次更加不同：這次的能量濃度更高，意味著較上次相比，此次聖所的降臨可能會更快――但這時各自治區卻還在整理事務中，實在是再壞不過。
desc.jp: 琳指出這次情況較上次更加不同：這次的能量濃度更高，意味著較上次相比，此次聖所的降臨可能會更快――但這時各自治區卻還在整理事務中，實在是再壞不過。
desc.zh_cn: 琳指出这次情况较上次更加不同：这次的能量浓度更高，意味着较上次相比，此次圣所的降临可能会更快――但这时各自治区却还在整理事务中，实在是再坏不过。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 看不見摸不著的聖所與能量體，意味著眾人無法對其從物理層面上打擊。
desc.jp: 看不見摸不著的聖所與能量體，意味著眾人無法對其從物理層面上打擊。
desc.zh_cn: 看不见摸不着的圣所与能量体，意味着众人无法对其从物理层面上打击。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: 老師向各位道歉，表示自己早就清楚一切事情――白子的變化、基沃託斯的總結、敵人的警告――如果不是他輕視事情的嚴重性，一切就可能都不會發生。
desc.jp: 老師向各位道歉，表示自己早就清楚一切事情――白子的變化、基沃託斯的總結、敵人的警告――如果不是他輕視事情的嚴重性，一切就可能都不會發生。
desc.zh_cn: 老师向各位道歉，表示自己早就清楚一切事情――白子的变化、基沃托斯的总结、敌人的警告――如果不是他轻视事情的严重性，一切就可能都不会发生。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

name.en: 只要把白子帶回來就好
name.jp: 只要把白子帶回來就好
name.zh_cn: 只要把白子带回来就好

desc.en: 就在老師和琳自責時，星野從對策委員會的課室接入通訊。她指出他們應對付的是色彩，並且只要把白子帶回來就好――如果真的與白子有掛關，把她“抓”回來就好。星野最後安慰老師，讓老師樂觀些；老師也承諾會將白子帶回來。
desc.jp: 就在老師和琳自責時，星野從對策委員會的課室接入通訊。她指出他們應對付的是色彩，並且只要把白子帶回來就好――如果真的與白子有掛關，把她“抓”回來就好。星野最後安慰老師，讓老師樂觀些；老師也承諾會將白子帶回來。
desc.zh_cn: 就在老师和琳自责时，星野从对策委员会的课室接入通讯。她指出他们应对付的是色彩，并且只要把白子带回来就好――如果真的与白子有挂关，把她“抓”回来就好。星野最后安慰老师，让老师乐观些；老师也承诺会将白子带回来。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。

desc.en: 為了突破阿特拉哈西斯的方舟設立的新軸，一行人緊急進行了討論，為了克服眼前的危機，愛麗絲想到了一個點子。
desc.jp: 為了突破阿特拉哈西斯的方舟設立的新軸，一行人緊急進行了討論，為了克服眼前的危機，愛麗絲想到了一個點子。
desc.zh_cn: 为了突破阿特拉哈西斯的方舟设立的新轴，一行人紧急进行了讨论，为了克服眼前的危机，爱丽丝想到了一个点子。

name.en: 即將撞擊多次元防護罩
name.jp: 即將撞擊多次元防護罩
name.zh_cn: 即将撞击多次元防护罩

desc.en: 75000m的高空上，眾人突然發現方舟改變了多次元防護罩，此前所作的計算完全失效。有人立即提出減速，但綾音表示由於速度過高，撞擊不可避免。
desc.jp: 75000m的高空上，眾人突然發現方舟改變了多次元防護罩，此前所作的計算完全失效。有人立即提出減速，但綾音表示由於速度過高，撞擊不可避免。
desc.zh_cn: 75000m的高空上，众人突然发现方舟改变了多次元防护罩，此前所作的计算完全失效。有人立即提出减速，但绫音表示由于速度过高，撞击不可避免。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 莉音指出方舟的保護罩不像是一種物質，更像是一種概念，而唯有符合相同概念的東西――另一個方舟，才能與之抗衡。陽葵立刻意識到莉音說的是愛麗絲，當場提出異議。
desc.jp: 莉音指出方舟的保護罩不像是一種物質，更像是一種概念，而唯有符合相同概念的東西――另一個方舟，才能與之抗衡。陽葵立刻意識到莉音說的是愛麗絲，當場提出異議。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央指出方舟的保护罩不像是一种物质，更像是一种概念，而唯有符合相同概念的东西――另一个方舟，才能与之抗衡。日鞠立刻意识到莉央说的是爱丽丝，当场提出异议。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音指出方舟的保护罩不像是一种物质，更像是一种概念，而唯有符合相同概念的东西――另一个方舟，才能与之抗衡。阳葵立刻意识到莉音说的是爱丽丝，当场提出异议。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央指出方舟的保护罩不像是一种物质，更像是一种概念，而唯有符合相同概念的东西――另一个方舟，才能与之抗衡。日鞠立刻意识到莉央说的是爱丽丝，当场提出异议。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 就在莉音和陽葵吵的不可開交之際，愛麗絲突然現身，表示理解了兩人所說的一切――作為無名諸神的王女的她，擁有著啟動另一艘方舟的能力。遊戲開發部眾人想起種種，立刻慌忙勸解愛麗絲不要做自我犧牲。但愛麗絲有自己的話，老師也制止了慌亂的大家。
desc.jp: 就在莉音和陽葵吵的不可開交之際，愛麗絲突然現身，表示理解了兩人所說的一切――作為無名諸神的王女的她，擁有著啟動另一艘方舟的能力。遊戲開發部眾人想起種種，立刻慌忙勸解愛麗絲不要做自我犧牲。但愛麗絲有自己的話，老師也制止了慌亂的大家。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在莉央和日鞠吵的不可开交之际，爱丽丝突然现身，表示理解了两人所说的一切――作为无名诸神的王女的她，拥有着启动另一艘方舟的能力。游戏开发部众人想起种种，立刻慌忙劝解爱丽丝不要做自我牺牲。但爱丽丝有自己的话，老师也制止了慌乱的大家。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在莉音和阳葵吵的不可开交之际，爱丽丝突然现身，表示理解了两人所说的一切――作为无名诸神的王女的她，拥有着启动另一艘方舟的能力。游戏开发部众人想起种种，立刻慌忙劝解爱丽丝不要做自我牺牲。但爱丽丝有自己的话，老师也制止了慌乱的大家。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在莉央和日鞠吵的不可开交之际，爱丽丝突然现身，表示理解了两人所说的一切――作为无名诸神的王女的她，拥有着启动另一艘方舟的能力。游戏开发部众人想起种种，立刻慌忙劝解爱丽丝不要做自我牺牲。但爱丽丝有自己的话，老师也制止了慌乱的大家。

desc.en: Kei清楚愛麗絲的意圖，表示如果強行重啟方舟，對她將是毀滅性的打擊，甚至可能以生命為代價。愛麗絲指出，如果那樣能幫助大家，那它就將不再是毀滅世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。愛麗絲還希望這麼做能讓莉音與陽葵和好。Kei仍然警告並表示擔憂。
desc.jp: Kei清楚愛麗絲的意圖，表示如果強行重啟方舟，對她將是毀滅性的打擊，甚至可能以生命為代價。愛麗絲指出，如果那樣能幫助大家，那它就將不再是毀滅世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。愛麗絲還希望這麼做能讓莉音與陽葵和好。Kei仍然警告並表示擔憂。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Kei清楚爱丽丝的意图，表示如果强行重启方舟，对她将是毁灭性的打击，甚至可能以生命为代价。爱丽丝指出，如果那样能帮助大家，那它就将不再是毁灭世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。爱丽丝还希望这么做能让莉央与日鞠和好。Kei仍然警告并表示担忧。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Kei清楚爱丽丝的意图，表示如果强行重启方舟，对她将是毁灭性的打击，甚至可能以生命为代价。爱丽丝指出，如果那样能帮助大家，那它就将不再是毁灭世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。爱丽丝还希望这么做能让莉音与阳葵和好。Kei仍然警告并表示担忧。
desc.zh_cn_cn: Kei清楚爱丽丝的意图，表示如果强行重启方舟，对她将是毁灭性的打击，甚至可能以生命为代价。爱丽丝指出，如果那样能帮助大家，那它就将不再是毁灭世界的工具，而是勇者的武器。爱丽丝还希望这么做能让莉央与日鞠和好。Kei仍然警告并表示担忧。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 愛麗絲向Kei抱歉，表示自己不應該逃避對她的認識，即便她們幾乎不可能互相理解。愛麗絲同情Kei作為毀滅世界的武器的感受，希望Kei能夠真正追求真實的自己，而不是照著自己可能原本並不願意的方向，就像老師對她說的那樣。愛麗絲還覺得，因為Kei是被意外唸錯的名字，這一名字的意義可以被重新定義。Kei似乎明白愛麗絲是想拯救她，而愛麗絲接受了這種解釋，並說“拯救他人，正是勇者的心意所在。”
desc.jp: 愛麗絲向Kei抱歉，表示自己不應該逃避對她的認識，即便她們幾乎不可能互相理解。愛麗絲同情Kei作為毀滅世界的武器的感受，希望Kei能夠真正追求真實的自己，而不是照著自己可能原本並不願意的方向，就像老師對她說的那樣。愛麗絲還覺得，因為Kei是被意外唸錯的名字，這一名字的意義可以被重新定義。Kei似乎明白愛麗絲是想拯救她，而愛麗絲接受了這種解釋，並說“拯救他人，正是勇者的心意所在。”
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝向Kei抱歉，表示自己不应该逃避对她的认识，即便她们几乎不可能互相理解。爱丽丝同情Kei作为毁灭世界的武器的感受，希望Kei能够真正追求真实的自己，而不是照着自己可能原本并不愿意的方向，就像老师对她说的那样。爱丽丝还觉得，因为Kei是被意外念错的名字，这一名字的意义可以被重新定义。Kei似乎明白爱丽丝是想拯救她，而爱丽丝接受了这种解释，并说“拯救他人，正是勇者的心意所在。”

desc.en: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
desc.jp: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第140首曲子，以主线故事中与爱丽丝的相关部分而熟知。

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.jp: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Kei啟動了協議，開始準備方舟的生成。眾人本以為Kei又佔據了愛麗絲的意識，但愛麗絲在一瞬間又變回了原樣。莉音驚訝於愛麗絲竟能設法讓Kei“服從”她，但愛麗絲糾正說，是她“接受”了請求。愛麗絲想要藉助會長的力量，同時希望能見她一面。
desc.jp: Kei啟動了協議，開始準備方舟的生成。眾人本以為Kei又佔據了愛麗絲的意識，但愛麗絲在一瞬間又變回了原樣。莉音驚訝於愛麗絲竟能設法讓Kei“服從”她，但愛麗絲糾正說，是她“接受”了請求。愛麗絲想要藉助會長的力量，同時希望能見她一面。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Kei启动了协议，开始准备方舟的生成。众人本以为Kei又占据了爱丽丝的意识，但爱丽丝在一瞬间又变回了原样。莉央惊讶于爱丽丝竟能设法让Kei“服从”她，但爱丽丝纠正说，是她“接受”了请求。爱丽丝想要借助会长的力量，同时希望能见她一面。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Kei启动了协议，开始准备方舟的生成。众人本以为Kei又占据了爱丽丝的意识，但爱丽丝在一瞬间又变回了原样。莉音惊讶于爱丽丝竟能设法让Kei“服从”她，但爱丽丝纠正说，是她“接受”了请求。爱丽丝想要借助会长的力量，同时希望能见她一面。
desc.zh_cn_cn: Kei启动了协议，开始准备方舟的生成。众人本以为Kei又占据了爱丽丝的意识，但爱丽丝在一瞬间又变回了原样。莉央惊讶于爱丽丝竟能设法让Kei“服从”她，但爱丽丝纠正说，是她“接受”了请求。爱丽丝想要借助会长的力量，同时希望能见她一面。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: 莉音用自己的小機器人將自己的全息影像投射到艦橋上，與愛麗絲交流。莉音對愛麗絲表示抱歉，但有些難以開口；愛麗絲表示感謝，指出莉音已經成為她的同伴；莉音有些驚詫，但愛麗絲表示敵人變朋友的故事可是相當常見。
desc.jp: 莉音用自己的小機器人將自己的全息影像投射到艦橋上，與愛麗絲交流。莉音對愛麗絲表示抱歉，但有些難以開口；愛麗絲表示感謝，指出莉音已經成為她的同伴；莉音有些驚詫，但愛麗絲表示敵人變朋友的故事可是相當常見。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央用自己的小机器人将自己的全息影像投射到舰桥上，与爱丽丝交流。莉央对爱丽丝表示抱歉，但有些难以开口；爱丽丝表示感谢，指出莉央已经成为她的同伴；莉央有些惊诧，但爱丽丝表示敌人变朋友的故事可是相当常见。

desc.en: 來到艦船末尾，Kei首先搜尋並確保方舟的所有資源可供使用。隨後，Kei宣佈“王女已獲得鑰匙”，而愛麗絲則宣佈以公主的名義，“允許新的聖所在此降臨。”
desc.jp: 來到艦船末尾，Kei首先搜尋並確保方舟的所有資源可供使用。隨後，Kei宣佈“王女已獲得鑰匙”，而愛麗絲則宣佈以公主的名義，“允許新的聖所在此降臨。”

desc.en: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。
desc.jp: 在獲得Kei的力量後進行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守護者就這樣全速向前進，成功進入了方舟的內部。
desc.zh_cn: 在获得Kei的力量后进行了重建，「阿特拉哈西斯：Supernova」粉碎了方舟的多次元屏障。生命守护者就这样全速向前进，成功进入了方舟的内部。

desc.en: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.jp: 莉音進一步解釋，愛麗絲的方舟與防護罩是同一種東西，因而這並非某種“複製”，應該能夠對其造成干涉。陽葵指出方舟的形態依建造者決定，顯然莉音的是一個堡壘都市，不過愛麗絲的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。日鞠指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉央的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。阳葵指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉音的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央进一步解释，爱丽丝的方舟与防护罩是同一种东西，因而这并非某种“复制”，应该能够对其造成干涉。日鞠指出方舟的形态依建造者决定，显然莉央的是一个堡垒都市，不过爱丽丝的嘛……

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.jp: 地上，工程師部三人發現艦艇的資料正在被分解而重新組合，最終變成了工程師部所鑄造的光之劍的模樣。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。
desc.jp: 命中的一炮產生了反向衝擊波。衝擊波後，艦長七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前進，試圖突破防護罩。碰撞後，綾音立刻減速。隨後與方舟本體發生碰撞，眾人成功突入進方舟內部。
desc.zh_cn: 命中的一炮产生了反向冲击波。冲击波后，舰长七神琳下令方舟以最大速度前进，试图突破防护罩。碰撞后，绫音立刻减速。随后与方舟本体发生碰撞，众人成功突入进方舟内部。
